## Main interface
```{bash}
bget -h

```

## bget api

```{bash}
bget api -h
```

```{bash}
bget api ncbi -h
```

```{bash}
bget api gdc -h
```

```{bash}
bget api dta -h
```

```{bash}
bget api cligov -h
```

```{bash}
bget api biots -h
```

## bget doi

```{bash}
bget doi -h
```

### bget seq

```{bash}
bget seq -h
```

### bget url

```{bash}
bget url -h
```

### bget key

```{bash}
bget key -h
```

```{bash}
## show all supported items
bget key -a
```
